profile.greeting: Welcome to Original Coast Clothing {{user_first_name}}! Click get started to enjoy our sample automated messaging experience. If you want to build a similar one visit https://fb.me/get-sample-oc

get_started.welcome: Hi {{userFirstName}}! Welcome to nARrative, an interative text based AR game where you get to decide how the story unfolds.
get_started.guidance: At any time, use the menu below to navigate through the story
get_started.prompt: You wake up a in a dimly lit room on a bed frame. You see a door to your left. What do you do?

step1.prompt: You open the door and enter the room. You see a staircase on the left going up, and a staricase going down on the right. Which staircase do you take? Choose wisely.

step2down.prompt: You go downstars, and follow the hallway to a basement. What? There are dead plants here! You are upset no one bothered to water the plants! There is a bookshelf in front of a tunnel, a window to the left, a storm drain in the middle of the room.

step2up.prompt: You go up stairs, and exit upon a roof. And the door shuts behind you. You turn around and try to open the door, but it doesn't budge. You see a rope on the left and a backpack on the right. What do you do?

step3down.prompt: You go through the tunnel, and it gets darker the deeper you go. When as you keep going you eventually see a light at the end of the tunnel. You escape.

step3rope.prompt: You examine the rope and see that it's sturdy, but it's too short to reach the bottom of the building. Do you still want to use it?

step3backpack.prompt: You examine the backpack. Oh wait, it's not just a backpack, it's a parachute! You jump off with confidence and parachute down to the ground level. Congrats! You escaped!
